thread.section_title: Japan Rail Pass Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Japan Rail Pass | japanrailpass.com.au
thread.title: Matthew Dennis
thread.title_full: Japan Rail Pass reviewed by Matthew Dennis

author: Matthew Dennis
title: Matthew Dennis
text: Although quite expensive the japan rail pass provided us with access to the shinkansens and hence a very effective way to travel long distances quickly in japan. Even though we speak very little japanese and this was our first overseas trip the instructions provided were quite clear. Japan can be a challenge but this is probably as easy a way to travel as you will find...
